title: Lesson 1
paragraph: Ambition drives people to pursue goals and achieve success. Those who strive, persevere, and dedicate themselves often reach new heights. Commitment and tenacity help turn aspirations into reality.

words.meaning: to make great efforts to achieve something
words.example: She strives to improve her skills every day.

words.meaning: to have a strong desire to achieve something
words.example: He aspires to become a successful writer.

words.meaning: an attempt to achieve a goal
words.example: Their endeavor led to a breakthrough.
She persevered through the long training program.
His ambition drives him to work hard.

words.meaning: to firmly decide on a course of action
words.example: She resolved to finish the project on time.

words.meaning: commitment to a task or purpose
words.example: His dedication to teaching is admirable.
Her tenacity helped her overcome obstacles.
With determination, he completed the marathon.

words.meaning: dedication to a cause or activity
words.example: Their commitment to the project was evident.
